name: Operation L.A.I.K.A.
description:
Overview - 

Operation L.A.I.K.A. is the game about a space dog Laika looking for a new place to live. You will help her to flight through dangerous space avoiding planets and asteroids and using space portals.

Controls -

Use W to accelerate forward and A and D to rotate the ship. Press R to restart current level and ESC to exit to main menu.

Restrictions - 

Game is suitable for any age, no restrictions
